name: copycat dishcloth
notes:
find this and other free knitting patterns at: [leahmichelledesigns.com/free-patterns][1]

this cotton dishcloth is a quick and easy knit. it is simple, symmetrical, and the two stockinette bands at each end mimic a traditional dishcloth, hence the name ‘copycat dishcloth’. by slipping the first stitch of every row and purling the last stitch, the 2 side edges maintain an attractive appearance and the dishcloth lays flat and square without the need for a border.

this pattern also makes a luxuriously soft washcloth when knit in a cotton chenille yarn.

join the [leah michelle designs ravelry group][2] for pattern support, announcements, promos, and kals.

subscribe to the [leah michelle designs newsletter][3] for pattern announcements and subscriber-only discounts.
